channel.title: Comments on: 208.4: Back on the Bike

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: I have that goal... Not sure where I'm at now, probably right about 220 maybe a little less. I need to drop to 198. Maybe I should try to exercise, instead of doing nothing at all. lol Actually, we finally got our bikes out of storage. So maybe its time to get them tuned up and pumped up and start riding. Soon as I get over this cold.
item.content:encoded: I have that goal… Not sure where I’m at now, probably right about 220 maybe a little less. I need to drop to 198. Maybe I should try to exercise, instead of doing nothing at all. lol Actually, we finally got our bikes out of storage. So maybe its time to get them tuned up and pumped up and start riding. Soon as I get over this cold.
